jeopardy.category: THE U.S. MILITARY ACADEMY AT WEST POINT

clues.category: THE U.S. MILITARY ACADEMY AT WEST POINT
clues.clue: (Jon of the Clue Crew reports from West Point, NY.)  The name West Point comes from the Academy's location on the west bank of this river about 50 miles north of New York City

clues.category: THE U.S. MILITARY ACADEMY AT WEST POINT
clues.clue: (Jon of the Clue Crew reports from a field at West Point, NY.)  This West Point grad went on to become a four-star general, & once declared, "It is as natural for me to be a soldier as it is to breathe"

clues.category: THE U.S. MILITARY ACADEMY AT WEST POINT
clues.clue: (Sarah of the Clue Crew is flanked by two students at West Point, NY.)  Freshmen at West Point are shown their place by being known as these, from a Roman term for ordinary, uneducated citizens

clues.category: THE U.S. MILITARY ACADEMY AT WEST POINT
clues.clue: (Sarah of the Clue Crew reads in front of a set of wooden doors at West Point, NY.)  The United States Military Academy's coat of arms depicts the helmet of this Greek goddess of wisdom & warfare

clues.category: THE U.S. MILITARY ACADEMY AT WEST POINT
clues.clue: (Jon of the Clue Crew reports from in front of a military exercise.)  A shortage of blue cloth led to uniforms of a different color & to this 3-word term for the corps of cadets

final_jeopardy.clue: In the 20th century, 2 of the 3 men who served less than 1 year as VP before becoming president
final_jeopardy.answer: (2 of) Theodore Roosevelt, Harry Truman & Gerald Ford
